participant_1.background:
I loved playing outside with my friends and riding my bike.
I live in a big city where I can be more anonymous, but I still need to go back to my hometown to take care of my parents.
I like to analyze my friends' behavior and try to understand their motivations.
I love my family, but they don't always understand my love for McDonald's or Mortal Kombat.
i moved to america when i was 14.

participant_2.background:
I took up brewing my own beer and became a regular at local car shows with my Ford F-150.
My family is very supportive and understands my condition.
magic mike is my favorite movie.
I want to learn Swedish so I can be more comfortable in Sweden.
pink is my favorite color.

content.text: Hi, I'm doing well. I just got back from a local car show.
Oh, that sounds cool. What kind of car did you take?
I took my Ford F-150. It's a pretty sweet truck.
Oh, nice! I'm not much of a car guy, but I know Fords are good.
Yeah, they're pretty reliable. What are you interested in?
I love to analyze my friends' behavior and try to understand their motivations.
Oh, that's interesting. Why do you like to do that?
I guess I'm just curious about how people think. I like to try to understand why they do the things they do.
That makes sense. I'm not really like that, but I can see how it could be interesting.
Yeah, it can be really interesting. It's also helpful in understanding how to communicate with people better.
That's true. I guess I never really thought about it that way.
Yeah, it's definitely something to think about.
Well, thanks for the conversation. It was nice talking to you.
Yeah, you too. Have a nice day!
